sentences.en: A leakage of kerosene has polluted water supplies.
sentences.cn: 泄漏的煤油污染了水源。

sentences.en: a leakage of toxic waste into the sea
Air leakage to the float bowl could result in imbalance of the carburetor.
sentences.cn: 空气漏入浮子室中,会使化油器不稳定.

sentences.en: As to the leakage, none could tell.
sentences.cn: 至于是不是泄密了, 谁也不知道.

sentences.en: Calcium is also necessary to prevent leakage of potassium during the aging of beet slices.
sentences.cn: 甜菜薄片衰老时期,钙对于防止钾离子丧失,也极其必要.

sentences.en: Check bottles for leakage before use.
sentences.cn: 使用前应检查瓶子是否渗漏。

sentences.en: Drainage is certainly indicated because of the probability of bile leakage.
sentences.cn: 由于有胆漏的可能性,引流肯定是需要的.

sentences.en: For photoflash, lug type, low loss factor and low leakage current.
sentences.cn: 闪光灯用焊片式产品, 具有低损耗, 低漏电等特点.

sentences.en: It should be possible to reduce leakage from pipes.
sentences.cn: 应该可以减少管道的渗漏量。

sentences.en: It's high time this leakage of information was put a stop to.
sentences.cn: 是结束这种泄密现象的时候了.

sentences.en: Large areas of land have been contaminated by the leakage from the nuclear reactor.
sentences.cn: 大片地区都被核反应堆的泄漏物污染了.

sentences.en: On absorbing water, the fibers expand to give an even tighter structure which resists leakage.
sentences.cn: 织物吸水时纤维膨胀,结构更加紧密因而能防止漏水.

sentences.en: Our two dangers were now delay and leakage, and the first aggravated the second.
sentences.cn: 我们当前的两种危险是拖延和泄密, 而前者又加重了后者的危险.

sentences.en: The continuing leakage is the result of the long crack in the pipe.
sentences.cn: 这根管子上的那一条裂缝致使渗漏不断.

sentences.en: The next most important complication of gastric surgery is leakage at a suture line.
sentences.cn: 胃手术的其次最重要的并发症是缝合处漏.

sentences.en: This tester is provided with a " Guard " terminal to prevent errors due to surface leakage.
sentences.cn: 本仪表装有 保护环 接线柱,用以纠正因表面漏电而造成的误差.

words.tran_cn: 水压试验时出汗；有漏元件；渗水铸件
泄漏；[土壤]渗漏物；漏出量

phrases.tran_cn: 泄漏试验；压漏试验；密封性试验
密封泄漏，汽封泄漏；气封

trans.tran_cn: 漏，漏出，泄露，[商]漏损率，漏损量，渗漏物，漏出量
trans.tran_en: when gas, water etc leaks in or out, or the amount of it that has leaked
